SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy is {below} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student enrollment?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverhaven Polytechnic}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total student enrollment?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Arcane University}.

VE.A: Aethelgard School of Arts's student enrollment in 1990 is {15379.72} students.

VE.Q: What is Arcane University's Student Enrollment in 1982?
VE.A: Arcane University's student enrollment in 1982 is {9157.62} students.

VE.Q: What are the student enrollment of Zenith Institute of Technology, Celestial College, and Arcane University in 1989?
VE.A: Zenith Institute of Technology's student enrollment is {9963.57} students, Celestial College's student enrollment is {15244.29} students, Arcane University's student enrollment is {7059.61} students.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Student Enrollment in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum student enrollment is {6893.93} students.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Student Enrollment level recorded for Aethelgard School of Arts?

SC.Q: What is the average total Student Enrollment?

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1989, was the average total Student Enrollment higher or lower than between 1982 and 1989?
NC.A: The average total student enrollment between 1979 and 1989 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1989.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1985, was the average total Student Enrollment higher or lower than between 1982 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total student enrollment between 1984 and 1985 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1984, did the total Student Enrollment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total student enrollment between 1982 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1979 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1988, did the total Student Enrollment experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total student enrollment between 1980 and 1988 was {smaller} than between 1988 and 1990.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Polytechnic} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Arcane University, Borealis Graduate School, Meridian Academy, Zenith Institute of Technology, Aethelgard School of Arts, Celestial College, Silverhaven Polytechnic}.
